quoteFirst: The islands we had passed lie between the latitude of 19 degrees 5 minutes south and 18 degrees 19 minutes south, and according to my reckoning from 3 degrees
quoteLast: degrees 46 minutes west longitude from the island Tofoa: the largest may be about six leagues in circuit; but it is impossible for me to be very correct. To show where they are to be found again is the most my situation enabled me to do.
title: A voyage to the South Sea
author: Bligh, William, 1754-1817

quoteFirst: Then he began to breathe more freely; "the girl," as he always mentally dubbed her, could not enter the grounds now without his seeing her.  He looked at his watch for the third time--
quoteLast: .  Just about the time he had planned.  She should be here soon if she had left Miss Lloyd's a little after two.
title: Silverthorns
author: Molesworth, Mrs., 1839-1921; Paton, J. Noël (Joseph Noël), Sir, 1821-1901 [Illustrator]

quoteFirst: "Gentlemen," he said, with a smile, "it is
quoteLast: . In seventeen minutes we shall all be blown up together. At least, that is what our good friend Don Luis Perenna declares."
title: The Teeth of the Tiger
author: Leblanc, Maurice, 1864-1941

quoteLast: : Sighted enemy submarine on the surface five points on the port bow. Dived and flooded both tubes.
title: The Story of Our Submarines
author: Bower, John Graham, 1886-1940

quoteFirst: So Bud Lee, riding as once those hard, dare-devil riders rode who carried across the land the mail-bag of the Pony Express, overtook Doc Tripp and changed to a fresh horse at the end of the first fifteen miles.  He swung out of his saddle, stretched his long legs, remarked lightly that it was a real fine day, and was gone again upon a fresh mount with twenty-five miles between him and Rocky Bend.  The clock at the bank marked
quoteLast: as Lee, leaving a sweating horse at the door on Main Street, presented his check at the paying teller's window.  The money, in a small canvas bag, was ready.
title: Judith of Blue Lake Ranch
author: Gregory, Jackson, 1882-1943; Dunton, W. Herbert, 1878-1936 [Illustrator]

title:
With the Battle Fleet
Cruise of the Sixteen Battleships of the United States Atlantic Fleet from Hampton Roads to the Golden Gate, December, 1907-May, 1908
author: Matthews, Franklin, 1858-1917; Reuterdahl, Henry, 1871-1925 [Illustrator]
